title: 1959년 In re McCarthy 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re McCarthy. 판결일: 1959-11-25. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Anna V. McCarthy, Alice McCarthy John E. McGeehan
**판결일**: 1959-11-25
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 9 A.D.2d 758

## 판결문 요약


Motion granted insofar as to extend appellant’s time to serve and file the record on appeal and appellant’s points to and including December 8, 1959, with notice of argument for the January 1960 Term of this court, said appeal to be argued or submitted when reached. If the above condition is not complied with, the respondents may submit an ex parte order, without notice to appellant, dismissing the appeal. Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, M. M. Prank, Valente and Stevens, JJ.
...
